text: Yakshcho zh vy rozluchylysya iz nymy ranishe toho, yak vy torknulysya yikh, ale pislya toho, yak vstanovyly nalezhnyy yim vidkup, to viddayte yim polovynu toho, shcho y nalezhytʹ yim — khiba yak vony vybachatʹ vam tse abo vybachytʹ toy, u chyyikh rukakh perebuvaye shlyubnyy dohovir. A yakshcho vy vybachyte, to tse bude blyzhche do bohoboyazlyvosti. Ne zabuvayte y pro dobrochesnistʹ, yaka povynna buty pomizh vamy. Voistynu, Allah bachytʹ te, shcho vy robyte
